text: Real Betis C was a Spanish football club based in Seville, in the autonomous community of Andalusia. It was the second reserve team of Real Betis, behind Real Betis B, and folded in 2011 due to economic problems. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=49%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Tier !Division !Place |- |style="background:#7FFF00;"|2003/04 !style="background:#7FFF00;"|8 |style="background:#7FFF00;"| |style="background:#7FFF00;"|1st |- |style="background:#77DD77;"|2004/05 !style="background:#77DD77;"|7 |style="background:#77DD77;"| |style="background:#77DD77;"|1st |- |style="background:#25A8F9;"|2005/06 !style="background:#25A8F9;"|6 |style="background:#25A8F9;"| |style="background:#25A8F9;"|5th |- |style="background:#25A8F9;"|2006/07 !style="background:#25A8F9;"|6 |style="background:#25A8F9;"| |style="background:#25A8F9;"|4th |- |style="background:#25A8F9;"|2007/08 !style="background:#25A8F9;"|6 |style="background:#25A8F9;"| |style="background:#25A8F9;"|1st |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|2008/09 !style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"| |style="background:#CECE1B;"|7th |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|2009/10 !style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"| |style="background:#CECE1B;"|7th |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|2010/11 !style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"| |style="background:#CECE1B;"|6th |} |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website *La Preferente team profile Category:Real Betis Category:Football clubs in Andalusia Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Spain
